main event: Two separate eyewitnesses observed a 'flying saucer' emitting a bluish-green glow for about three minutes on January 3, 1950, at an estimated altitude of 3000' in Brooklyn, New York.
interesting points: The UFO sighting was observed by two individuals on different dates, adding credibility to the report.
The object remained stationary and emitted a strange bluish-green fluorescent glow for a period of about 30 seconds.
The sighting was reported to the Director of Intelligence at Mitchell Field, Long Island.
The UFO report was declassified but downgraded at regular intervals, indicating ongoing official interest in the event.
The witnesses offered to continue monitoring for similar objects, expressing a willingness to provide further information.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
